name: Magic Missile Barrage
description: Immediately play all Magic Missile cards in your deck.

immediateEffect.script: int missileCount = 0; var toRemove = new List<Card>(); foreach (var card in PlayerDeck) { if (card.Id == "magic_magic_missile") { toRemove.Add(card); missileCount++; } } foreach (var card in toRemove) { PlayerDeck.Remove(card); PlayCard(card); } Log(PlayerDisplayName + " unleashes a barrage of " + missileCount + " Magic Missiles!");
